items.note: Highest-ever allocation with focus on indigenous manufacturing and modernization.
New high-speed rail corridors and Vande Bharat expansion across the country.
PM-KISAN, crop insurance, and natural farming initiatives support.
Ayushman Bharat expansion, new AIIMS, and digital health infrastructure.
NEP implementation, skill development, and digital education push.
Roads, highways, ports, airports under PM Gati Shakti mission.
MGNREGA (₹30,000 Cr), rural housing, and drinking water projects.
PLI scheme expansion and semiconductor manufacturing support.
